question.title: What is the first step to take when a person is having a generalized convulsive seizure?

option_a.title: Call for emergency medical services (EMS) immediately.

option_b.title: Try to remain calm and still.

option_c.title: Stay with the person and try to keep them calm.

option_d.title: Call for a friend or family member to help.

correct_option.title: Option A
correct_option.description: This consists only a letter of the correct option
